oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 6 fascicules in various pagings and number sequences.
Published for the Imāmī Ismāīlī School.
Binding and pages in poor condition.
Frontispiece: Portrait of Aga Khan III in full regalia.
MS Indic 2534. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
In various Indic languages in Khojki script.

With: Satveṇī:niñḍhī / Pīr Imām Shāh ; Vāek:vaḍo / Pīr Shams ; Sī(30):harfī / Sayyid Amḥad Shāh ; Satgûr:nûrjo:ramtā {Satgûrnā vīvā?] / Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn ; Satgûrnûre:pûtlā:naćāveā:te [Pûtlā] / Pīr Satgûr Nûr, Pīr Imām Shāh ; Taîe:tame [vaḍo] / Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn ; [Dhañdhûkār] / Pīr Ḥasan Kabīr ad-Dīn ; Sen ākhāḍo / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Ḥasan Shāh, ... [et al.] ; Sûbhûjo:ginān / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Ḥasan Shāh, ... [et al.] ; Popaṭne:sûrjārāṇī:nī:vāt / Pīr Shams ; Ginān:ghaṭpāṭjo / Pīr Ṣadr ad-Dīn, Pīr Imām Shāh, Pīr Ḥasan Shāh, ... [et al.].
